title: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S)
description: Bug 2529[Navigator] Open/Close project not always available (1GFKW5S) Now select both P1 and P2.
OB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not visible.
EB: When both P1 and P2 are selected, both Open Project and Close Project menu items should be available.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator.
2. Select both P1 and P2.
3. Observe that the Open Project menu item is available, but the Close Project option is not visible.
